constituent: violent, water, water droplets, water pistol, white, dove, compass, direction, taskmaster
heisigStory: Some cosmic taskmaster hovering overhead whips up the waves to make them dash violently against the shore. In the white foam that covers the water we see a broken compass floating, all that remains of a shipwreck.
koohiiStory1: When the taskmaster found his favorite white compas damaged by water, he became the most violent taskmaster there ever was.
koohiiStory2: Overnight the slave got Violent and was Set Free. Overnight....Set Free.
myStory: bạo lực. đánh nhau hướng trắng ra nước. đánh nhau chiều hướng qua đêm
words: stimulus, impetus, incentive, excitement, irritation, encouragement, motivation
